Description.SourceString: The Special Skill is the Hero's activated ability. Special Skills cost mana to activate, and are usually very powerful. Special Skills can have a wide variety of effects, including: different types of attacks, healing, creating elemental terrain, buffs, and debuffs. Heroes gain skill experience every time they participate in a level. Skill experience levels up a Hero's Special Skill making it more powerful over time.
